summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from Alki Avenue to West Hanford Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7483, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
